title: Clickers club: photo adventures in curriculum
creator_contributor_role: Corporate Development, Western Region and TV ED Productions, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Photography - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Interdisciplinary approach in education
Crafts & Visual Arts/Photography - Study and teaching
description: Outlines the aims of a new photography club established throughout Victorian schools. Marg Sheehan interviews Leigh Hepburn who introduces the Project Kit, Roxanne Rodgers who explains its uses in an integrated curriculum and Gail Evans who applies the resources during a primary school class excursion to the zoo.
